meanings.definition: Showing great care and perseverance in carrying out a task or duty.
meanings.sent1: Her assiduousness approach to her studies impressed her teachers.
meanings.sent2: The team's success was due to their assiduousness in preparing for the competition.
meanings.sent3: His assiduousness in watering the plants every day paid off with beautiful blooms.
meanings.sent4: The writer's assiduousness in crafting each sentence was evident in the final manuscript.
meanings.sent5: The chef's assiduousness in selecting the freshest ingredients made the dish unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Diligent and hard-working in one's efforts.
meanings.sent1: The student's assiduousness in completing assignments on time earned praise from the teacher.
meanings.sent2: Her assiduousness in her job led to a promotion within a year.
meanings.sent3: The detective's assiduousness in solving the case surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: His assiduousness in honing his skills made him a master craftsman.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's assiduousness in training paid off with a gold medal.

meanings.definition: Constant in application or attention; diligent.
meanings.sent1: The employee's assiduousness in following company protocols was commendable.
meanings.sent2: Her assiduousness in maintaining the garden kept it flourishing all year.
meanings.sent3: The robot's assiduousness in performing tasks efficiently amazed the engineers.
meanings.sent4: The artist's assiduousness in perfecting each brushstroke resulted in a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's assiduousness in conducting experiments led to groundbreaking discoveries.
